avatarDescription: JPG, GIF or PNG up to 5MB.
basicInformationDescription: Update the basic information for your account.
changePasswordDescription: Update the password used to log in to your account.
confirmYourPasswordDescription: This is a secure area of the application. Please confirm your password before continuing.
copyrightNotice: Copyright Â© {{year}} Moon Pixels Ltd. All rights reserved.
dataTableResults: {{from, number}} to {{to, number}} of {{total, number}} results
deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all of its data. This action cannot be undone.
disableTwoFactorWarning: Disabling two-factor authentication will weaken your account security.
emailDeliveredTo: The email was delivered to {{email}}. If you can't find it, check your spam folder.
emailVerificationEmailSentDescription: We've emailed you instructions to verify your email address. You should be receiving it shortly.
emptyTableDescription: There are no records to display. Try adjusting your search criteria or filters.
enableTwoFactorDescription: Scan the QR code below with your two-factor authentication app then enter the code shown.

filterClause.greaterThanOrEqual: is greater than or equal to
filterClause.lessThanOrEqual: is less than or equal to

forgotYourPasswordDescription: Enter your email address below and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
genericErrorDescription: It looks like something may have gone wrong on our end. Try refreshing the page, or come back later.
loginToAccountDescription: Log in using your email address and password.
name: Name
passwordResetEmailSentDescription: We've emailed you instructions to reset your password. You should be receiving it shortly.
passwordUpdatedDescription: Your password has been updated, you can now log in with your new password.
preferencesDescription: Update your account preferences to customise your experience.
recoveryCodesDescription: These are your recovery codes. You should write them down on a piece of paper and store them in a safe place.
registerNewAccountDescription: Enter your information below to create your account.
resetYourPasswordDescription: Choose a new secure password for your account.
selectYourLanguage: Select the language you would like to use.
twoFactorAuthenticationDescription: Add additional security to your account using two-factor authentication.
twoFactorCodeDescription: Enter the code from your authenticator app to continue.
twoFactorDisabledDescription: Two-factor authentication has been disabled for your account.
twoFactorEnabledDescription: Two-factor authentication has been enabled for your account.
twoFactorRecoveryCodeDescription: Enter one of your recovery codes to continue.
verifyEmailDescription: To complete registration, we need to verify your email address. Please check your email for the verification link.
